model.name: kamelet
model.title: Kamelet
model.description: To call Kamelets in special situations
model.label: eip,routing

name.description: Name of the Kamelet (templateId/routeId) to call. Options for the kamelet can be specified using uri syntax, eg mynamecount=4&type=gold.

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable this EIP from the route.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
